Name: Inverter Changeover
checklistText:
<size=21>FC Power Plant Check</size>Inverter Changeover

	

				WARNING

			Ensure at least one inv on each
			ac bus at all times (if available).

		
		a. Dual Inv (No. 1 &2) Oper

Panel 3:
	AC2 RSET - OFF

	INV 2 - MNB



	INV 1 AC2 - OFF

	INV 2 AC2 - on (up)



	AC2 RSET - RSET

Panel 1, 3, 122:
	MASTER ALARM pb/lt (3) - on
	MASTER ALARM pb/lt - push
	MASTER ALARM pb/lt (3) - out

Panel 2:
	C/W lts (all) - out


		Perform AC Voltage Check

	b. Single Inv Oper
		AC2 RSET - OFF
		INV 2 - OFF

		INV 2 AC2 - OFF

		INV 1 AC2 - on (up)


		

		AC2 RSET - RSET

Panel 1, 3, 122:
	MASTER ALARM pb/lt (3) - on
	MASTER ALARM pb/lt - push
	MASTER ALARM pb/lt (3) - out

Panel 2:
	C/W lts (all) - out
	Perform AC Voltage Check

	

	c. Stby Inv (No.3) Check or Oper

Panel 3:
	AC2 RSET - OFF
	INV 2 - OFF
	INV 3 - MNB
	

	INV 2 AC2 - OFF

	INV 3 AC2 - on (up)


	AC2 RSET - RSET

Panel 1, 3, 122:
	MASTER ALARM pb/lt (3) - on
	MASTER ALARM pn/lt - push
	MASTER ALARM pb/lt (3) - out

Panel 2:
	C/W lts (all) - out

Panel 3:
	Perform AC Voltage Check

	If stby inv check
		Go to dual inv (No. 1 & 2)
			oper, a., & set
			INV 3 - OFF
